body: At some point you were tainted with the corruption of the undead, and you have gained some of their defenses. You gain either a +1 trait bonus on Fortitude saving throws or a +2 trait bonus on saving throws against mind-affecting effects (your choice).
name: Deathtouched
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Race Traits/Bloodline Race Traits/Deathtouched
